jake

 
#!/usr/bin/env node

Try to load a local jake


        		
        
          
try {
  require(`${ process.cwd() }/node_modules/jake`);
}


        		
      

    
      

        
          

  



If that fails, likely running globally


        		
        
          
catch(e) {
  require('../lib/jake');
}

var args = process.argv.slice(2);

jake.run.apply(jake, args);
